PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-02782014-03-14,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectIndian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission
PrecisOrder (1) extending the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission ending June 30, 2015; and (2) specifying that, effective June 30, 2014, the mandate of the Commission and of the Commissioners shall be the mandate set out in section 3 of the Order of the Supreme Court of British Columbia dated January 30, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
